name: Knights of Valour 3
overview:
Knights of Valour is a very classic and popular (especially in Asian countries) side-scrolling action arcade game series from Taiwan. Waiting for ten years after Knights of Valour 2, IGS brought us its orthodox sequel – Knights of Valour 3 in 2011, only released for PolyGame Master 2 (PGM2) platform.

After Japanese Warriors of Fate, Taiwanese Knights of Valour series began a more long-term fashion in all arcade game rooms. Especially the first two works are still the favorite ones for many video game players, which can be considered as a rare flag of arcade games.

Knights of Valour 3 removed the classic character 黄忠, replaced by his made-up ‘daughter’ – 黄芸. The most surprising is, this work new added two playable characters: 刘备 and 周瑜! Plus other familiar generals, a brand-new generation of Knights of Valour did not let KoV fan players down!
